title.value: The use of different selection methods in improving the breeding and productive qualities of Russian heavy draft horses
Использование различных селекционных приемов при совершенствовании племенных и продуктивных качеств лошадей русской тяжеловозной породы

organization.name: The Scientific and Practical Center of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus for Animal Breeding

person.name: Gorbukov, M.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: In course of the research there were studied different selection methods in improving the breeding and productive qualities of Russian heavy draft. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. As a result of realized research there was characterized the current state of Russian heavy draft, analyzed using various ways to improve the selection. A more detailed description of the types of higher nervous activity was provided, their relationship with the major economic-useful features horses were studied, their influence on the development of selected signs and their use in improving the breed were defined. To optimize the conditions for obtaining high-quality products of horse breeding in the Republic and to improve the efficiency of breeding in Russian heavy draft, selected in Belarus, it is necessary to select horses in the farm by originally and typicality, conformation, quality of offspring; at this stage of selection to 40% of the breeding stock used in intra-line rebounds with moderate inbreeding (F = 0.4-0.9%) on the distinguished ancestors; to introduce in breeding farms the modified method of determining of the type of higher nervous activity in horses, stallions and test mares in 3 to 4 years of age; at the selection of stallions and mares to admit for reproduction individuals predominantly strong types of higher nervous activity.
